message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $80. Considering its quality and unique features, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $95. This is an opportunity to get a high-value item at a reasonable discount. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $80 for the product.
